name: Isometric Bridge Simulation with ActionScript 3
body:
Document that shows how to get the mathematical model for a bridge simulation consisting of a series of plates interconnected by elastic springs under the force of random vehicles of several weights. [ISSUU document](http://issuu.com/jpruiz114/docs/bridge_plates_simulation) `
`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
